roleset.name: to start again or anew
roleset.note: RESTART-V NOTES: Frames file for 'restart' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'start'. (from restart.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The Belgian computer system]-2 finally was repaired and restarted [*-2]on Tuesday of this week , with the aid of Toronto Stock Exchange officials who [*T*-1] developed the system .
example.arg: with the aid of Toronto Stock Exchange officials who [*T*-1] developed the system

example.name: transitive
example.text: She worked part-time as a consultant and wrote a book , but never restarted her high-powered legal career .
